favourite.article: After my vigil, the spirit of God laid it in my heart to sing this song as a seal to my prayers. My expectations shall not be cut short in the name that is above all names Jesus Christ the son of the living God. There is power power wonder working power in the blood of Jesus! I believe..
This song lifts my soul high up, to the realms of the heavens. We are singing this in church tomorrow. Wonderful Jesus! Thank You for shedding Your blood for the remission of our sins. Hallelujah!
Dealing with my inadequacies, this songs comes upon my heart. I thank God for the power in the blood of Jesus.
As I have come to Jesus for cleansing I will be whiter than snow. The blood of Jesus washes, cleanses and make whole. Thanks for uploading this song and God bless you all. Shalom!!!

Howard Higashi, at his mother's death bed in one sentence, be it life or death for his mother; "Believe unto the Lord Jesus", and following that said "Mother I want to teach you a song." "There is power, power, wonder-working power, In the blood of the Lamb;" Hallelujah their is power over death and power over Satan in the precious blood of the lamb.
i have seen God's power of healing in my life through this song. Indeed God is God.
A soul lifting and challenging song. It wakes my day up. God bless the soul of Lewis Ellis Jones.
Thank God for all the the blood of Jesus has done, is doing and will do for me.
This is my most favourite hymn. I sang it for the first time on the night I got saved. I sang it like a man possessed and I was. Possessed of the Holy Spirit of God and changed forever, Hallelujah.
I really like this song. Victory in Jesus!
We ought to know and always remember the love of the Father and His power to save through the blood of our Lord Jesus Christ.

Lately, in my prayers for someone's soul, I have been using Leviticus 17:11: "For the life of the flesh is in the blood: and I have given it to you upon the altar to make an atonement for your souls: for it is the blood that maketh an atonement for the soul." This Old Testament type is, of course, a foreshadowing of the precious blood of Jesus. I Peter 1:18a, 19, 20 says: "Forasmuch as ye know that ye were not redeemed with corruptible things, as silver and gold...But with the precious blood of Christ, as of a lamb without blemish and without spot: Who verily was foreordained before the foundation of the world, but was manifest in these last times for you." There truly is Power in the Blood of the Lamb to save the human soul! Thank You, dear Lord Jesus!
Nice. I feel full of rejoicing when I heard this song. I hope you can add more hymns from now on.
